name: Detonation Code
description: If you control a "Topologic" Link Monster: You can target 1 DARK non-Link Dragon, Machine, or Cyberse monster in your GY; Special Summon it. During the Standby Phase of the next turn after this card was banished from the Spell & Trap Zone: You can Set this card. You can only use each effect of "Detonation Code" once per turn.
